title: Coesia Group to Showcase Sustainable Packaging, Automation Solutions at PACK EXPO - Packaging Strategies
summary: Coesia, a group of innovation-based industrial and packaging solutions companies, showcased its latest sustainability and automation solutions at PACK EXPO Las Vegas. The group's GREENMATION initiative aims to help manufacturers achieve their sustainability goals while enhancing their automation capabilities. Coesia is committed to supporting customers throughout the manufacturing process with innovative solutions that ensure production reliability and allow operators to focus on value-added tasks.

title: Ball Aerosol Packaging releases new report on innovative Eyeris® printing technology for sustainable aluminum ... - Ball
summary: Ball Corporation's Eyeris® enhanced printing technology offers unparalleled visual appeal for aluminum cans and bottles, enabling brands to differentiate their products and connect with consumers through high-resolution, photo-realistic imagery. Eyeris® aligns with the growing demand for sustainable packaging, as aluminum is infinitely recyclable and has a lower carbon footprint than other packaging materials. By eliminating the need for additional labels, Eyeris® further enhances the sustainability of aluminum packaging.
green_innovation: TRUE, Eyeris® contributes to environmental sustainability by eliminating the need for additional labels and reducing waste.
business_innovation: TRUE, Eyeris® is a new and improved business process that differs significantly from Ball's previous printing processes and offers greater efficacy, resource efficiency, and affordability.
green_product: TRUE, Aluminum packaging with Eyeris® technology is a green product as it is designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces its environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: TRUE, Eyeris® is a green process as it minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability by eliminating the need for additional labels and reducing waste.

title: Sustainability doesn't have to be boring - HCT'S newest innovations - Premium beauty
summary: HCT Group is focused on offering sustainable stock tools, including a new refillable palette, a refillable monomaterial pump, and refillable jars, to help brands launch with strong sustainability claims. The company believes that there is a lot of brand competition right now, and for smaller brands that have disruptive ideas, they can help them launch right out of the gate with strong sustainability claims and uniqueness. HCT is encouraging brands to reach out to set up a meeting to explore new stock tools and find ways to help them make the shift to a more sustainable future.

title: Honoring eco-friendly action: About the 2023 Sustainable Beauty Awards - CosmeticsDesign.com USA
summary: The Sustainable Beauty Awards, running since 2013, honor sustainability leaders in the beauty industry, including cosmetic brands, ingredient firms, and packaging suppliers. The awards process is currently open for submissions, with five categories for consideration: New Sustainable Products, Sustainable Packaging, Sustainable Ingredient, Sustainable Pioneers, and Sustainability Leadership. The Sustainable Beauty Awards reception will be held at the Crowne Plaza Republique hotel in Paris on October 30th.

title: European Commission Adopts Measures Restricting Intentional Microplastics - Cosmetics & Toiletries
summary: The European Commission (EC) has adopted measures to restrict microplastics intentionally added to products under the EU chemical legislation REACH. The new rules will prevent the release to the environment of approximately half a million tonnes of microplastics. The measures will prohibit the sale of microplastics, products to which microplastics have been intentionally added, and products that release those microplastics when used.
green_innovation: TRUE. The new rules will prevent the release to the environment of approximately half a million tonnes of microplastics, contributing to environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE. The new rules will impact various industries and require stakeholders to develop and switch to alternatives, fostering innovation.
green_product: TRUE. The new rules will restrict the sale of products containing microplastics, promoting the development and use of more environmentally friendly products.
green_process: TRUE. The new rules will restrict the sale of products that release microplastics when used, promoting the development and use of more environmentally friendly processes.

title: Giants lead green packaging future - Vietnam Investment Review
summary: Green packaging is becoming increasingly important in Vietnam as consumers demand more sustainable products. Foreign businesses are leading the way in green packaging innovation, with companies like Unilever, Nestlé, and Sidel investing in new technologies and materials. The Vietnamese government is also supporting the transition to green packaging through regulations that require manufacturers to take responsibility for the recycling of their products.

title: Sustainable strides: Mengniu overcomes recyclability challenges of dairy packaging - FoodNavigator-Asia.com
summary: Mengniu, a Chinese dairy company, has partnered with Dow to develop a new recyclable yogurt pouch using Dow's INNATE TF-BOPE resins. The pouch is made from a mono-material, which makes it easier to recycle. Mengniu has a goal to achieve 100% technically recyclable packaging by 2025.

title: Omnia Packaging brings sustainable packaging business to Guelph - University of Guelph News
summary: Omnia Packaging, an Italian company specializing in sustainable packaging solutions, has expanded to Guelph, Canada. Omnia's paper division produces innovative paper-based packaging solutions that can replace plastic trays, while its plastic division provides sustainable plastic packaging to various industries. The company is committed to sustainability and plans to hire ten employees by next March.

title: CEFLEX Teams up with Recyda to Facilitate Sustainable Design Check Tool - Packaging Strategies
summary: CEFLEX released design guidelines in 2020 to aid organizations in optimizing flexible packaging for circularity. The guidelines have been well-received, and to aid their use, CEFLEX has partnered with Recycla to develop a free online "Design Check" tool. The tool can be used to quickly assess whether a packaging design or specification adheres to the CEFLEX guidelines.
green_innovation: TRUE, the CEFLEX D4ACE guidelines and the Design Check tool promote environmentally sustainable packaging design by providing guidance and assessment for improved collection, sorting, and recycling of flexible packaging.
business_innovation: TRUE, the CEFLEX D4ACE guidelines and the Design Check tool are business innovations because they represent new or improved business processes for the flexible packaging industry that can lead to greater resource efficiency, reliability, and affordability in the production and design of flexible packaging.
green_product: TRUE, the CEFLEX D4ACE guidelines and the Design Check tool can be used to design green products because they help to ensure that flexible packaging is optimized for collection, sorting and recycling, thereby reducing its environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: TRUE, the CEFLEX D4ACE guidelines and the Design Check tool promote the implementation of green processes because they provide guidance and assessment for the design of flexible packaging that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability in the flexible packaging industry.
official_company_name: CEFLEX (Circular Economy for Flexible Packaging) and Recycla
product_or_process: CEFLEX D4ACE guidelines and Design Check tool

title: DTS Europe actively contributes to a more sustainable Beauty generation - Premium beauty
summary: **Summary:** DTS Europe offers the market a complete and varied range of mono-material and 100% recyclable products. The cosmetic products formulations and sustainability of DTS Europe are associated with sustainable formulations with organic or natural ingredients that usually quite challenging as they contain active ingredients and no preservatives and in most cases, this type of formula requires an airless system that doesn’t oxidise the formula and protects it until it comes into contact with the skin. Sustainable packaging (100% mono-material and 100% recyclable) can transport these formulas to the consumer and play a fundamental role in the entire sustainability chain and in the circular economy.

green_product: **Green product:** TRUE. DTS Europe's niche portfolio includes a wide range of sustainable and elegant packaging capable of integrating any skincare and make-up product line. The range consists of flexible packaging available in more than 5 diameters and filling capacities ranging from 8ml to 90ml.

title: Molpack, HP Team Up to Revolutionize Molded Fiber Production in Latin America - Packaging Strategies
summary: Molpack Corporation, a molded fiber packaging provider in Latin America, has partnered with HP to digitize and transform the industrial production of molded fiber products using HP's Molded Fiber Advanced Tooling Solution. This collaboration aims to reduce CO2 emissions and replace single-use plastics with sustainable packaging solutions. HP's technology optimizes manufacturing processes and enhances sustainability by reducing the carbon footprint during tooling and part production, resulting in lighter parts with equal or better performance.
green_innovation: TRUE. The innovation is a green innovation because it contributes to environmental sustainability goals by reducing CO2 emissions and replacing single-use plastics with more sustainable packaging solutions.
business_innovation: TRUE. The innovation is a business innovation because it is a new or improved business process (or combination thereof) that differs significantly from the firm's previous business processes and that has been brought into use in the firm. The new process includes the adoption and modification of digital technologies to optimize manufacturing processes and enhance sustainability.
green_product: TRUE. The innovation is a green product because it is a new or improved product that is designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces its environmental impact throughout its life cycle. The molded fiber products are made from recycled paper, which reduces the use of virgin materials and promotes sustainability.
green_process: TRUE. The innovation is a green process because it is a new or improved business process for one or more business functions that differs significantly from the firm’s previous business processes and that has been brought into use in the firm. The new process includes the adoption and modification of digital technologies to optimize manufacturing processes and enhance sustainability.
product_or_process: HP's Molded Fiber Advanced Tooling Solution
